data.title: Fraternity & Sorority Programs
data.text:
Joining a fraternity or sorority doesn’t just shape your college experience, it shapes your life. Because of this lifelong commitment, it is important that you do research and join the organization that is right for you.

Below you will find links to each of our organization’s individual website, either their national or local chapter. Throughout this section of our website you will find information on the governing councils that our chapters belong to, cost of membership, housing opportunities/requirements, academic performance, judicial standings, and more.
